summary: The concept of "television teaching," which is a redirect to the preferred term "distance learning," pertains to educational methodologies facilitated through audiovisual media. In the context of EU legal and regulatory frameworks, distance learning encompasses various forms of remote education, including online courses and virtual classrooms, which have gained prominence due to technological advancements and the need for flexible learning environments. The EU supports distance learning initiatives through policies aimed at enhancing educational accessibility and promoting lifelong learning. This regulatory focus underscores the importance of integrating innovative teaching methods to meet diverse educational needs across member states.
